nio/FindFace.description: Find a face encoding within a frame from an incoming signal, compare the encoding with encoding of known faces from an input signal, output a signal containing the name of the found face.

accuracy.title: Comparison Accuracy
accuracy.description: Degree of confidence for finding faces.

capture.title: Image
capture.description: The frame (or image) to compare to the known faces.

location.title: Output Face Location
location.description: Include coordinate location of face on output signal.

known.description: Signal to add the known face encodings and names to compare found faces against. Expects a 'faces' object which contains a list of objects with attributes 'name', 'user_id', 'id', and 'encoding'.

unknown.description: Signal to with an image to search for faces.

default.description: A signal containing the name of the identified face.

nio/GetEncodingFromFile.description: Load face image file and serialize the encoding.

image_paths.title: Image Path
image_paths.description: Full path to the image file that will be added.

sname.title: Save Name
sname.description: Name of the face being added to the database.

uid.title: User ID
uid.description: Id of the face being added to the database.

default.description: Any list of signals with the path to the face image.
A signal containing the facial encoding, user id, and name.
